# TVTopShelfInsetContent

**Class**

A set of items to present using an inset-style interface in the top shelf.

## Declaration

```swift
class TVTopShelfInsetContent
```

## Overview

Create a [doc://com.apple.tvservices/documentation/TVServices/TVTopShelfInsetContent] object when you want to display your top shelf content using an inset interface. The layout for an inset interface shows a series of large images, each of which spans almost the entire width of the screen. The focused image appears raised above the background.

For more information about how to configure images for an inset interface, see [https://developer.apple.com/design/human-interface-guidelines/tvos/icons-and-images/top-shelf-images/].

## Creating an Inset Content Object

- **init(items:)**: Creates an inset content object and populates it with the specified set of items.

## Getting the Items

- **items**: The items to display from the inset interface.

## Getting the Image Size

- **imageSize**: The standard width and height for images in an inset interface.

## Sectioned and inset content

- **TVTopShelfSectionedItem**: An item to display in a section-based interface.
- **TVTopShelfItemCollection**: A group of items that you display together in a sectioned interface in the top shelf.
- **TVTopShelfSectionedContent**: The set of items you want to present using a section-based interface in the top shelf.

## Inherits From

- NSObject

## Conforms To

- CVarArg
- CustomDebugStringConvertible
- CustomStringConvertible
- Equatable
- Hashable
- NSObjectProtocol
- TVTopShelfContent
